Text: I'd never heard of YMO but I got it on a chance it might be good, you've made a fan of me, thanks very much :)

This is SO nice!!! I am so happy to have found this! I was actually looking for YMO when this came up, and what a nice surprise. I haven't been thinking about them for MANY years but now I even have this itch in my brain because I had a 12'' with them but I can't remember which one... :( And even worse: I have sold it! :( *2 Now I just wish the YMO-torrent will come alive too... Lazy downloaders as so often here at TPB! Anyway: thank you so so much, clone!

D-mn!!! Now I remeber which 12'' I had, since I hear the song in my ears in this moment: Unit! It would have been something for your collection, clone, wouldn't it? :) A really FAT 12''... I remeber that I even played it when I was DJ-ing, at least once. But the I have a memory of the small-town people leaving the floor in a hurry... :)
No seeding....:( can anybody seed please. Or contact me to get upload info for my FTP
Just be aware that two of the three albums are very, VERY incomplete (two-three tracks out of nine). :(

Hej

Av Logic System har jag 3 LP?s; Logic (1981), Venus (1981) och Orient Express (1982). Är de fortfarande av intresse? Superskön musik!
Jaa, Iwera, mer Logic, har en gammal repfri vinylare själv, även 16 bit om nån kommer ihåg. Tyvärr vet jag inte hur man konverterar en LP till mer moderna saker. =(
I love their "Logic" album. I still have the original vinyl LP. Would love to have a decent FLAC version of it, though.
